reviewText: I only bought this for The Deadly Drifter, it is not advertised as being edited but it is. I would recommend finding a different copy & not waste your money on this one.

I only wanted this for The Cold Room, but the transfer of it is atrocious--full frame and VERY grainy and faded, almost certainly a transfer from a VHS tape.  This is the kind of item it's not worth paying the transport cost for...look for it at a bargain store and don't pay more than a buck or two for it.
